Are you curious about ðŸŽ’ what does he use?

I am a Frontend developer, I have been working with Web Technologies for 4 years. And for 3 years I have been using React with any personal project and have experience building robust interfaces. I am looking to collaborate in a position as Frontend Developer in Web Applications or Mobile Applications, I also like JavaScript a lot because it allows me to work on the client side as well as on the server side.
Technologies I use frequently : React, Express, Flutter, Firebase, Mongo
Other technologies I have worked with : PHP (Laravel), Python, Java SE, C ++, MySQL, GraphQL, among other JavaScript libraries.
